publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: Formerly
there was principled government
the same, a certain; the very same 一孝
x number of virtues
obtain
blessing from heaven
essential dynamic nature (of a thing), natural tendency
come to conform to, conform to; be in accordance with; be in conformity with
good government; perfect government

tls:text.tls:line: In what Heaven is a cover over,

sense.def: cover in order to protect what is covered, or sometimes to hide discreetly

tls:text.tls:line: in what the Earth supports,

sense.def: support; bear, bear up under

tls:text.tls:line: in what Man does,

sense.def: walk on, use as one's walking surface tread on; step on (so as to hold down)

tls:text.tls:line: it is the main point in human morality.

sense.def: principles underlying human relations and moral behaviour; proper human relations; standards of proper human conduct

tls:text.tls:line: When one acts according to it that brings good luck,

sense.def: act according to

tls:text.tls:line: and when one offends against it that brings bad luck.

sense.def: contravene, flout; be disobedient to; ZUO Xi 23: offend against (Heaven, one's husband etc.); go against (the agricultural seasons); disobey (an order) very occasionally used nominally: error

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven never shows partiality

sense.def: will never (in generalisations); at no time (during a certain period), never (無有 there never are any)

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven never shows partiality

sense.def: be selfish; be directed towards selfish ends; pursue selfish aims

tls:text.tls:line: and the four seasons take their course.

sense.def: act/move in accordance with the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: then he will be supremely well adjusted.

sense.def: to be supremely well-adjusted; to be supernaturally well-attuned

tls:text.tls:line: As for zhōng refers toconcentrating the mind.

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

tls:text.tls:line: As for zhōng refers toconcentrating the mind.

sense.def: (cause to become a unit >) to unite (e.g. the empire); unify (people's outlooks), cause to (continue to be) unified

tls:text.tls:line: As for zhōng refers toconcentrating the mind.

sense.def: attitude of mind

tls:text.tls:line: is because its good fortune is long-loasting.

sense.def: good fortune (from heaven)

tls:text.tls:line: one just wears one's ritually prescribed court dress and things are transformed of themselves.

sense.def: wear ceremonial dress; wear official garb

tls:text.tls:line: his helpers are so excellent,

sense.def: [THIGHS AND ARMS>] helpers

tls:text.tls:line: his helpers are so excellent,

sense.def: be excellent; (of persons) be competent and efficient; be really good; be good and productive (of fields); (of medicines) be effective

tls:text.tls:line: and all affairs are so well-appointed!

sense.def: be delightfully serene

tls:text.tls:line: collecting grain to pay as taxes to the king,

sense.def: (sow and harvest>) husbandry; agricultural production

tls:text.tls:line: and all the lands will be at peace.

sense.def: the state
